description: Try our easy to follow Mocha Shake recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Mocha Shake Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Place crushed ice in 4 chilled serving glasses.
Pour chocolate topping into each glass.
Pour Baileys, coffee and milk into a blender and blend until frothy and well combined.

Pour carefully into serving glasses over the back of a spoon so that the mixture floats on top of the chocolate. To serve, top with a dollop of cream and dust with powdered chocolate. Note: Espresso coffee can be made with instant coffee. Use about 30ml. Chocolate topping (sauce) can be swirled around the glass for presentation.
